description: The request for proposal (RFP) is issued by the National Research Council of Canada for the construction of the LOTC site infrastructure, including roadwork, utilities, and civil works.
full_summary:
------------------------------------------------

**Title:** M12 Lab B25 Renovation

**Contract Reference Number:** PW-23-01022859
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 22-58128

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Project Scope:**
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites contractors to submit a proposal for the renovation of Lab B25 in Building M12 at the Montreal Road Campus of the NRC. The project includes the accommodation for two new workstations and the renovation of the existing space. Additionally, mechanical and electrical upgrades will be performed for two new fume hoods and two new mass spectrometers.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on technical merit (40%) and price (60%). A minimum of 10 years of experience in general contracting and comparable construction services is mandatory. The proposed construction schedule will also be evaluated.

**Security Requirement:**
Successful contractors must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD). Additionally, all subcontractors and personnel assigned to the project must hold a valid Reliability Status.

**Tender Documents:**
Tender documents are available online via the Buyandsell.gc.ca TMA service provider. Addenda will be available from the same source. Bidders are responsible for ensuring they have the most up-to-date documents.

**Site Visit:**
A mandatory site visit will be held on February 1st and 2nd, 2023, at 9:00 a.m. All bidders must attend and have their representative sign an attendance form before leaving the site.

**Closing Date:**
The tender closing date is February 16th, 2023, at 14:00.

**Contact Information:**
For questions regarding the project, please contact:
